nodes.text: Imroosians were a sentient species that existed within the galaxy. Margo, Dryden Vos' concierge aboard First Light, was an Imroosian from the volcanic planet Imroosia. Imroosians developed flinty, chalk-like skin to adapt to their heated climate.
The look of the Imroosians were reused concept art of Qi'ra, from when she was originally intended to be an alien.
